pkproject

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkproject.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    This class remembers: Where the Snake's head is, Where the Snake's tail is, Where the Snake's current direction is to. This class calculates, Where next tail will be, where next head will be.
    Author:
    Guyiyu

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(int direction)
        Note, direction won't be change until next refresh. UP=0, DOWN=1, LEFT=2, RIGHT=3.
        Parameters:
        direction - the snake's NEXT direction.
